title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: airbrushed on plain weave
description: Half-drop repeat of the Empire State Building, the Statue of Liberty, the Capitol Building in Washington, D.C., and the Golden Gate Bridge, along with white clouds and red apples with large bites taken out. On the clouds in red, white and blue: "I like you, America." Printed for the Bicentennial.
name: Textile
